import React, {useState} from 'react'; import '../../styles/pages/authentication/SignUpStyle.css'; import backgroundImage from '/public/map.png'; // Import your background image function SignUpPage() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ email: '', password: '', username: '', }); // Use JavaScript to set the background image dynamically const signupContainerStyle = { backgroundImage: `url(${backgroundImage})`, backgroundSize: 'cover', backgroundPosition: 'center', backgroundRepeat: 'no-repeat', minHeight: '100vh', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', }; return (

setFormData({...formData, email: e.target.value})} required className="input-field" />
setFormData({...formData, password: e.target.value})} required className="input-field" />
setFormData({...formData, username: e.target.value})} required className="input-field" />

); } export default SignUpPage;
